name: flexwise-monorepo

scripts.build:all: npm run build:vue && npm run build:react
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=@flexwise/shared && npm install --workspace=@flexwise/vue-app && npm install --workspace=@flexwise/react-app
scripts.supabase:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id $SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID > packages/shared/supabase-types.ts

description: FlexWise monorepo with Vue 3 and React 19 apps using Supabase and Builder.io
author: FlexWise Team
